(last updated 2012-02-16)

MIME media type name : Application

MIME subtype name : Vendor Tree - vnd.adobe.formscentral.fcdt

Required parameters : none

Optional parameters :
none

Encoding considerations : binary


Security considerations :
Programs which open this file type must prompt the user before executing
any active content.

The media type does indirectly contain active content. One of the assets
that are included within this media type is an XDP file.

XDP files may contain script, database access definitions and other
active content. When interpreting an XDP file, a processor must ensure
that active content is run in a 'sandbox' environment where resource
access is appropriate for the level of trust.

The media type doesn't need any privacy or integrity services.

Interoperability considerations :


Published specification :
none

Applications which use this media :


Additional information :

1. Magic number(s) : none
2. File extension(s) : fcdt
3. Macintosh file type code : FCDT
4. Object Identifiers: none

Application Name: Adobe FormsCentral
Brief Description: Application that authors, distributes and manages
online forms.
File Type Name: FormsCentral Design Template
File Type Description: A form design template for use with Adobe
FormsCentral.
Download Type: Viewer Application
Destination URL: https://www.acrobat.com/formscentral
Destination URL Type: Buy Online - Download


Person to contact for further information :

1. Name : Chris Solc
2. Email : csolc&adobe.com

Intended usage : Common
Identifier for Adobe FormsCentral Design Templates.

Author/Change controller : Adobe Systems, Incorporated / 345 Park Avenue
/ San Jose, CA 95110
